channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How A Two-Hour DNA Test Could Disrupt The Global Shark Fin Trade
item.description: A new portable DNA test can identify dozens of shark and ray species in only two hours, giving frontline officers a powerful tool to stop illegal wild...

item.title: Team Vitality Charts Path To Esports Supremacy After Dominant 2025
item.description: Teaam Vitality was the biggest name in esports in 2025, and it believes it has the best ideas, structure, and strengths for esports supremacy by 2030.

item.title: Samsung One UI 8.5 Release—This Changes Android
item.description: One of Samsung's biggest new updates is not what you expect — but it's critical.
